concept.title: Origins
concept.shortdesc: An origin stage represents the data that you want the pipeline to process. You can use a single origin stage in a pipeline.

conbody.p:
You can use the following types of origins in a pipeline: list the origin types. quick description.
Directory - Reads files from a directory.
File Tail - Reads data as it is written to a file.
Kafka Consumer - Reads data from Kafka
